external_games.name: Idle Champions - Wyrm Slayer Ravengard Theme Pack

name: Idle Champions: Wyrm Slayer Ravengard Theme Pack
summary: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Duke Ravengard (if you don't already have them) Wyrm Slayer Ravengard Skin An Exclusive Familiar An Epic Feat for Duke Ravengard 1 Epic Potion of the Gem Hunter 16 Gold Duke Ravengard Chests with 2 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Cards
